sentences.en: Are steps taken to minimise damage or contamination during the assembly phase?
sentences.cn: 在组装阶段有否采取步骤以减少污损?

sentences.en: Banks can minimise their credit risk by vetting borrowers carefully.
sentences.cn: 银行可以通过核查借贷者的状况来让信用风险最小化.

sentences.en: Can Sequential Administration Minimise the Cost of High Dose Chemotherapy?
sentences.cn: 循序行政管理能使高剂量化疗成本最小化 吗 ?

sentences.en: How do I minimise the cost?
sentences.cn: 我如何实现成本最小化?

sentences.en: Minimise contact between the patient and the family.
sentences.cn: 患者应减少与家人接触.

sentences.en: Misting frosted plants can help to minimise dehydration.
sentences.cn: 薄雾能够减小霜冻给植物所带来的脱水问题.

sentences.en: Regulation cannot prevent financial crises altogether, but it can minimise the devastation.
sentences.cn: 尽管管理方案无法百分之百地防止金融危机的发生, 但是监管方案能够把破坏最小化.

sentences.en: Singer believes we an obligation to minimise world - wide suffering.
sentences.cn: 辛格认为我们有义务减少全世界的痛苦.

sentences.en: So the enezuelans devised a structure to minimise the disruption.
sentences.cn: 因此委内瑞拉就建立一种结构来使公司崩溃的可能性达到最小.

sentences.en: The Mayor of Jerusalem has tried to minimise conflict by maintaining a middle way between the various religions.
sentences.cn: 耶路撒冷市市长对各宗教采取折中的态度，力图使冲突最小化。

sentences.en: The right style of swimsuit can help to hide, minimise or emphasise what you want it to.
sentences.cn: 款式选择得当的泳装有助于按照意愿掩饰、缩小或突出某些部位。

sentences.en: Their immune systems are artificially suppressed, to minimise the chance of rejection.
sentences.cn: 为了减少排异反应,在移植时要采取人为的措施来抑制受体的免疫系统.

sentences.en: Use the self - timer or a remote shutter release to minimise camera shake.
sentences.cn: 使用自拍模式或者线控快门,以减少相机振动的影响.

sentences.en: Whenever setting the slips , lower tubulars slowly to minimise shock loading.
sentences.cn: 任何时候坐卡瓦时, 慢放钻具最大限度地减小冲击载荷.

sentences.en: You can minimise the dangers of driving by taking care to obey the rules of the road.
sentences.cn: 严格遵守交通规则,你就能把行车危险降到最低点.

trans.tran_cn: 把…减至最低数量[程度]，对（某事物）作最低估计，极力贬低（某事物）的价值[重要性]
